item.title: **fixed
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

[quote=“big b140, post:4, topic:152343”][code]::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
:: ::
:: This Compiler is under no licenses and may ::
:: be distributed freely. ::
:: ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
[/code] that’s the “ONLY” compiler that worked for me you try it lol might be the “ONLY” one that could work for you lol[/quote]

Damn, all you people using the Compiler I gave you guys, I feel so special…Lol.

item.title: **fixed
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

This is the compiler i’m using.
Should I get a different one? And If I should what one?

[code]@echo off
title rs3 Revolution Compiler-Made by rs w00dcut

:Main
echo echo:::Rs w00dcut ftw!::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Enter one of the following, and press enter.
echo :::: Compile = Compiles your server.
echo :::: Exit = Exits the program
echo :::: Run = Runs your server
echo :::: Change = Change the backround and text of the compiler.
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

set /p choice=:: Choice:

if %choice%==compile goto com
if %choice%==exit goto exi
if %choice%==run goto run
if %choice%==change goto cha
if %choice%==Compile goto com
if %choice%==Exit goto exi
if %choice%==Run goto run
if %choice%==Change goto cha
if %choice%==COMPILE goto com
if %choice%==EXIT goto exi
if %choice%==RUN goto run
if %choice%==CHANGE goto cha

:com
cls
title Compiling…
echo :: Server Compiling
echo ::
echo ::Results:
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
javac *.java
echo :: Done!
pause
cls
goto main

:exi
cls
echo :: Thanks for using this compiler!
pause
exit

:run
cls
title Running Server…
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
cls
goto main

:cha
cls
echo :: Enter one of the following to change background colour.
echo :: B0 = Black
echo :: B1 = Blue
echo :: B2 = Green
echo :: B3 = Cyan
echo :: B4 = Red
echo :: B5 = Purple
echo :: B6 = Yellow
echo :: B7 = White
echo.
echo :: Enter one of the following to change text colour.
echo :: T0 = Black
echo :: T1 = Blue
echo :: T2 = Green
echo :: T3 = Cyan
echo :: T4 = Red
echo :: T5 = Purple
echo :: T6 = Yellow
echo :: T7 = White

set /p s=:: Choice:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main
[/code]
